text.section: This section applies only in Montgomery County and Prince George's County.

The Washington Suburban Sanitary Commission and the Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission shall provide any information and assistance requested by the county council or the county executive for preparing, reviewing, adopting, revising, or amending a county plan.

The county council and county executive of each county, the Washington Suburban Sanitary Commission, and the Maryland-National Capital Park and Planning Commission shall adopt procedures for:
Requesting information or assistance under this section;
Responding to the request; and
Setting a reasonable timetable for response to a request.
